Smart Garden Hose: Create a garden hose with built-in sensors and a mobile app that tracks water usage, detects leaks, and optimizes watering schedules based on plant type and weather conditions.
Water-Saving Nozzle: Develop a garden hose nozzle that uses advanced water-saving technology to reduce water flow by up to 50%.
Automated Watering System: Create a fully automated watering system that uses a combination of sensors, timers, and valves to deliver the perfect amount of water to plants at the right time.
Solar-Powered Garden Hose: Develop a garden hose that harnesses the power of the sun to provide a constant supply of water to plants.
Self-Reeling Garden Hose: Create a garden hose with a self-reeling mechanism that automatically winds up excess hose when not in use.
